Cyber-Physical Systems Symposium (CyPhySS 2020)

Cyber-Physical Systems Symposium (CyPhySS 2020)

CyPhySS 2020 will be jointly held with the Electrical Electronics and Computer Sciences (EECS) Symposium. The symposium invites students, researchers and the industry experts to attend the talks and poster/demo session which will be completely virtual and held on 11 July 2020. For more information log on to Symposium website.


About CNI

The Centre for Networked Intelligence, under the division of EECS and RBCCPS, IISc, aims to develop next generation networking methodologies and concept solutions that can derive knowledge from evolved networks of the future.
